author: gpetruc
body:
Migration also of CkfPattern, on top of 555
Notes:
- the data access through the MeasurementTracker is not yet migrated (requires a major redesign of the MT class)
- some non-production code in DebugTools has not been migrated, will do later
title: Tracking getByToken migration, part 1 (RecoTracker/CkfPattern and RecoTracker/DebugTools)
